caption.title: Classification of months according to the intensity of dengue transmission and of precipitation, Fortaleza, 2011â€“15.
caption.p: Months with high intensity of transmission (more than 9% of total annual dengue cases or more than 1,000 total cases citywide) are represented in pink, and those with low intensity in green. Months with high intensity of rainfall (more than 100 millimeters), medium (15-100mm), and low (less than 15mm) are represented in shades of blue.
